title: Location transfer issues
body:
I keep getting errors while trying to transfer from NA to EU West. Help please!

I want to add that whenever I click the confirm button I get the dancing Katarina figure (with the ''Purchasing...'' text) for about 30 seconds, then an error window pops up claiming there to be an issue with the transfering service.

Screenshot: http://gyazo.com/56113fa122597c2c5b0ba1f5767b251a

replies.body: Zoey! Could you try to transfer now? It should allow you to transfer now!

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GdB5Tfen,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-17T19:10:43.293+0000)
>
> Zoey! Could you try to transfer now? It should allow you to transfer now!

It doesn't happen anything. Now I am not even getting the error message. Instead it just shows the Katarina dance forever.

> [{quoted}](name=Zoey the Pumpkin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GdB5Tfen,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2014-12-17T19:53:16.626+0000)
>
> It doesn't happen anything. Now I am not even getting the error message. Instead it just shows the Katarina dance forever.

It worked now. Thanks Riot!

Wait why would you want to transfer to EUW? :P






jk

> [{quoted}](name=Corvic Maractis,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GdB5Tfen,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-17T18:55:55.728+0000)
>
> Wait why would you want to transfer to EUW? :P
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> jk

Because I am tired of having a constant 200 ms on the NA servers... Besides, I live in Europe :)

Hey Zoey,

We are looking into this issue at the moment! Hopefully we can fix what's causing these transfer issues!
